name: Money Field
description:
Money is everywhere, if you know how to take it!

Harvest all the money from fields with super SATISFYING animations!

Hire helper to earn faster! Collect rewards from giftboxes!

You can invest in some small lands or you can just go for the big one!

Can you have them all?

Download and enjoy!
developers: Virtual Projects Oyun Yazilim Ve Teknoloji
publishers: Virtual Projects Oyun Yazilim Ve Teknoloji Limited Sirketi
